attributes.action: take military action in Zimbabwe to restore peace and try Robert Mugabe for crimes against humanity
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Britain, as a co-creator of the Republic of Zimbabwe, has a moral obligation to intervene militarily to protect the people of that country from persecution and violence, whether unilaterally or in an international coalition . The armed forces should stabilize the country, restore order and civil liberties, create the conditions that enable free and fair elections, bring Zanu criminals to justice, and begin fair negotiations on land settlement.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
